thread.title_full: CNN Demands Ben Carson Recognize Obama’s “Christianity” | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: CNN Demands Ben Carson Recognize Obama’s “Christianity” | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
http://google.com/safebrowsing/diagnostic?tpl=safari&site=theblacksphere.net&hl=en-us Given President Barack Hussein Obama’s unconventional religious background – he attended a socialist and racist hate cult masquerading as a church for over twenty years – many Americans are uncertain of his faith and doubtful of his declarations of Christianity. Naturally, the powers that be at CNN view this as an inconvenient truth to be aired in public. Given the left-wing media’s recent hysteria over Ben Carson’s “anti-Muslim” comments, Carson has been invited to speak at many TV news shows as the usual suspects try to trip him up and frame him as a hateful bigot.
True to form, Wolf Blitzer dutifully executed his duties as commanded. Watch him badger Ben Carson and demand that he swear fealty to The Narrative and recognize President Obama’s Christian bona fides.
Blitzer even managed to drop the “birther” meme, as if it didn’t originate with Hillary Clinton’s failed presidential campaign in 2008.
This is CNN at its best, or worst, depending on your sense of humor.
